headline: Assessing Expand Energy (EXE) Valuation After Its Recent Rebrand And Mixed Share Price Performance
summary: Why Expand Energy’s new identity has investors taking a closer look Expand Energy (EXE) recently changed its name from Chesapeake Energy Corporation in October 2024, a shift that puts fresh attention on how the business mix and current share price fit together. See our latest analysis for Expand Energy. The rebrand comes after a mixed stretch for the stock, with a 10.42% 1 month share price return decline and a modest 6.90% 1 year total shareholder return, suggesting momentum has softened...

headline: Analysts Raise Price Targets on Expand Energy (EXE), Keep ‘Buy’ Rating
summary: Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) is included among the 10 Best Natural Gas Stocks to Buy Right Now. Formed in 2024 by the merger of Chesapeake Energy Corporation and Southwestern Energy Company, Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) operates as an independent natural gas production company in the United States.
